title: Scramble
creator_credit: Eady-Barnes Productions, Children's Film Foundation and David Eady
brief_description: Jimmy has been in trouble with the police. He is befriended by a group who invite him to join the local Motorcycle Scramble Club. Jimmy and his friends become involved with a couple of crooks who attempt to sabotage the club’s chances of winning. Rated: G (
